name: @Youtube:  Assorted Tweaks
description:
Assorted Youtube Tweaks:  
* Highlight author comments (ie, your own comments).
* Larger default textarea input for comment posting; comment style tweaking.
* Highlight already-subscribed subscribe buttons.
* Larger add-to-playlist panels; tint favorite playlist.
* Suppress flash upgrade alert for users choosing not to use flash.
* Improved visibility of watched video (video feed)
